query: If I have 5 apples and give 2 to my friend, then buy 3 more, how many apples do I have?
A train travels at 60 mph. How far will it travel in 2.5 hours?
If a rectangle has a length of 8 cm and a width of 5 cm, what is its area?
John is twice as old as Mary. Mary is 15 years old. How old is John?
If the sum of two numbers is 20 and their difference is 4, what are the two numbers?
